1:
CIRCULAR 24 / 2000 
 
 
SUB: SAFE CUSTODY HAND BAGGAGES 
 
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that the airlines staff is not deployed 
to take care of the hand baggage left by the passengers going for identification of their 
baggage.  In this connection instructions issued vide Circular No.  11/2000 dated 11.04.2000 
(copy enclosed) are reiterated to be implemented meticulously so as to preclude any 
possibility of security lapse.  
  
 
(R.K SINGH) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-25(6) / 97 /DIV-I  
Dated : 09.08.2000
